    • Method Detail

      • cookie

        RequestBuilder cookie(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> cookies)
        Purpose: This service is used to Add cookies to be sent with the request as Map
        Parameters:
        cookies - The Map containing the cookie name and their value to set in the request.
        Returns:
        The request specification builder

      • authParams

        RequestBuilder authParams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> authParams)
        Purpose: This service is used to Add a parameter to be sent with the request.
        Parameters:
        authParams - The Map containing the parameter names and their values to send with the request.
        Returns:
        The request specification builder

                          java.lang.String queryValue)

        queryValue - The parameter value

        paramValue - The parameter value
        Returns:

      • addMultipart

        RequestBuilder addMultipart(java.lang.String controlName,
                            java.io.File file)
        Purpose:Specify a file to upload to the server using multi-part form data uploading with a specific control name. It will use the content-type application/octet-stream.
        Parameters:
        controlName - Defines the control name of the body part. In HTML this is the attribute name of the input tag.
        file - The file to upload
        Returns:
        The request specification builder

      • build

        ResponseOptions build()
        Purpose: This service is used to Build RequestSpecBuilder.
        Returns:
        The assembled request specification
